name: Mystland
description:
Mystland is a prototype game. It is in the alpha state. Although the "engine" is somewhat advanced, it is necessary to add a lot of things. The game pretends to be a sandbox with a bit of survival and a bit of retro mechanics. The graphic style will be cartoon type using a kind of mode 7 (2.5d). In this state what i most need is feedback.
Thank you very much for trying it and also for your interest in the game. No downloads for the moment.
